content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
April 6, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Makan Delrahim, of California, to be an Assistant Attorney General, vice William Joseph Baer, resigned.Eric D. Hargan, of Illinois, to be Deputy Secretary of Health and Human Services, vice William V. Corr, resigned.David L. Norquist, of Virginia, to be Under Secretary of Defense (Comptroller), vice Michael J. McCord.
